alert.note: Alert for Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 10:52AM EST until January 17 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 10 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches, sleet accumulations of around one quarter of an inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Somerset and Northern Piscataquis Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 10 PM EST Monday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. Damage to trees and power lines is possible.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
